title: AMERICAN HORROR STORY: SEASON 8? (2018)
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: I think they should do s8 or 9 of serial killers like dahmer or those tipe of guys and taissa farmiga and Evan peters should totally be together again, they make a wonderfull couple ❤️ s8 or 9 with taissa and Evan could be like bonny and Clyde ❤️(love that story and love serial killers and those type of things, mi family thinks im crazy bc i tell them that i want to kill my brother but its true) (this comment is too deep) 😂
I love AHS.i especially loved hotel and cant wait for the next season!

If they bring back Kit I'm so excited for a Lana appearance. Damn I love her. But considering it's the future...well Lana would need something to keep her alive still since she looked pretty old at the end of Cult..perhaps that's the dental appliance.
They need to make another Coven
please let season 8 not be aliens!!
